attributes.action: listen the public other new treaty and in general
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pm to get back in touch with the people of the uk not just on the eu treaty but on health eduction and transport.and to state when the next election wil be..and to listen to opion polls on eu and alll other major subjects what matter to the uk people

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
